CustomField.formula: (ordexp_nett_amount__c + TAD_Surcharge_Amount__c + ordexp_Date_City_Change_Refund__c) - (ordexp_total_payment_received__c + ( IF( Old_Credit_orders__c=true, Total_Credit_Amount__c,0 ) ) - ordexp_total_refund_amount__c - Total_Coupon_Amount__c - ( IF( RecordType_Name__c == 'Hotel', Total_QFF_Refund__c,0 ) ))
CustomField.label: Total Amount outstanding
